attributes.action: abolish loopholes in legislation which prevent the improvements of un-adopted roads and private streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I live on an un-adopted road/ private street which is owned by both residents and the local authority. 
 The condition of the road is so bad it will be unuseable in 2/3 years. The majority of residents have raised money to improve the road condition. Loop holes in the Highways Act 1980 means we cannot enforce other residents or the LA to contribute. This is a problem throughout the country.
